FuzzyGroupset¶

class FuzzyGroupset(source: Union[str, List[hotfis.membership.fuzzygroup.FuzzyGroup]])¶

Bases: object

A collection of membership function groups for use in FIS evaluation.

Membership function groupsets are collections of membership function groups used for streamlined membership inference system evaluation.

Groupsets can be defined directly with a List of named membership function groups. Alternatively, they may be defined by passing the path to text file formatted with template names and parameters.

Parameters

source – Path to file with membership function groups or MembGroups.

groups¶

Dictionary of named groups.

Type

Dict[str, FuzzyGroup]

Example

Method 1:

>>> groupset1 = FuzzyGroupset([
>>>     FuzzyGroup("temperature",  30, 70, [
>>>         FuzzyFunc("cold", [30, 40], "leftedge", ),
>>>         FuzzyFunc("warm", [30, 40, 60, 70], "trapezoidal"),
>>>         FuzzyFunc("hot", [60, 70], "rightedge")
>>>     ]),
>>>     FuzzyGroup("heater", 0.0, 1.0, [
>>>         FuzzyFunc("off", [0.1, 0.2], "leftedge"),
>>>         FuzzyFunc("medium", [0.1, 0.2, 0.8, 0.9], "trapezoidal"),
>>>         FuzzyFunc("on", [0.8, 0.9], "rightedge")
>>>     ]),
>>> ])

Method 2:

=== example_groups.txt ===

group temperature
leftedge cold 30 40
trapezoidal warm 30 40 60 70
rightedge hot 60 70
domain 30 70

group heater
leftedge off 0.1 0.2
trapezoidal medium 0.1 0.2 0.8 0.9
rightedge on 0.8 0.9
domain 0.0 1.0

>>> groupset2 = FuzzyGroupset("example_groups.txt")

Methods

__getitem__(group_name)

Supports subscripting with group name.

__iter__()

Can iterate through each group.

__setitem__(group_name, group)

Supports group assignment with subscripting.

copy()

Returns deep copy of groupset

items()

Returns each group name and object.

keys()

Returns the names of each contained group.

values()

Returns each group.
__getitem__(group_name) → hotfis.membership.fuzzygroup.FuzzyGroup¶

Supports subscripting with group name.

Parameters

group_name – Name of the group to retrieve.

__iter__()¶

Can iterate through each group.

__setitem__(group_name: str, group: hotfis.membership.fuzzygroup.FuzzyGroup)¶

Supports group assignment with subscripting.

Will overwrite a group if it already exists.

Parameters

  • group_name – The group name.

  • group – Group to save in groupset.

copy()¶

Returns deep copy of groupset

items()¶

Returns each group name and object.

keys()¶

Returns the names of each contained group.

values()¶

Returns each group.
